content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
Both process iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Line
- Furnace 3 at position(4.0, 4.0) processing copper ore into copper plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Located around position(9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access non-existent lab
- Ensure lab entity exists at position(0.5, 28.5) before trying to access it
- Verify lab placement and coordinates before attempting operations

### Errors with inventory shortages
- Monitor coal levels in inventory to prevent furnace fuel shortages
- Ensure sufficient materials are available before attempting insertions into machines

### Entity placement errors
- Verify target positions are valid and clear before placing new entities
- Check entity dimensions to ensure sufficient space for placement

### Resource management
- Keep track of coal supplies for furnaces and inserters
- Monitor ore supplies to maintain continuous production
- Ensure regular fuel supply to boiler for consistent power generation
